item.title: Rajuk’s short-sighted DAP puts millions at risk in a major quake
item.description: Unplanned urbanisation, violations of the National Building Code and the Detailed Area Plan (DAP), and rampant filling of wetlands with sand for housing projects have made Dhaka the riskiest city in the country.
